property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike When Attended Knight enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The virtues of knighthood are best taught in the field.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target artifact, creature, or enchantment on the bottom of its owner's library. Miracle {W} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Blade Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Phyrexian Golem artifact creature token. Golems you control have first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Flesh is a betrayal of the self."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying. Miracle {X}{W}{W} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What root and branch cannot reach, our winged friends will attend to." - Zunak, Selesnya strategist

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Flickerwisp enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its wings disturb more than air.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The essence of a lawful society is swift deterrence."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When target creature dies this turn, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In my moment of death, I had a vision of the world, dark and unwelcoming. I wanted to hide in the deepest meander, but the light pulled me back."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In life, they were a motley crew: farmers, lords, cutpurses, priests. In death, they are united in singular, benevolent purpose.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Kor Hookmaster enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For us, a rope represents the ties that bind the kor. For you, it's more literal."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Kor Skyfisher enters the battlefield, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sometimes I snare the unexpected, but I know its purpose will be revealed in time."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying. Flashback {1}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The murdered inhabitants of Hollowhenge impart to the living the terror they felt in death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Activated abilities of creatures your opponents control can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who seek to disturb the harmony of life will see their instruments taken from them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Lone Missionary enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His mission has become a grim pilgrimage, a tour of the Eldrazi-stricken outposts across Zendikar. But he marches on alone, stubborn as the daily dawn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Master Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Phyrexian Golem artifact creature token. Golems you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With Phyrexia's victory at hand, each sect began perfecting its vision.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control. Flashback {3}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If exactly one creature is attacking, you may pay {W} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Destroy target attacking creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each spike is poisoned - the trapmaker's idea of mercy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ranger of Eos enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to two creature cards with mana value 1 or less, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At his side, humble beasts become weapons more deadly than sharpened steel.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Flying When Restoration Angel enters the battlefield, you may exile target non-Angel creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Populate. Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. (To populate, create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each upkeep, you may exile target creature card from your graveyard. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's a Spirit in addition to its other types. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sensor Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Phyrexian Golem artifact creature token. Golem creatures you control have vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With clarity of vision comes clarity of function.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One does not question the size or shape of the grains of sand in an hourglass. Nor do I question the temperament of the souls under my guidance."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Activated abilities of artifacts can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The relic's purpose? Its design? Whatever the intent, it is now a mere curiosity that breaks up the horizon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put all creatures on the bottom of their owners' libraries. Miracle {W} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Urbis Protector enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Guilds be damned. We can fend for ourselves." - Vennick of the Gateless

property.name: Rules
property.value: Populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You see a bird, an oak, a packbeast. I see the potential for an army." - Lalia, Selesnya dryad

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let no child be without a sword. We will all fight, for if we fail, we will certainly all die." - Oracle en-Vec

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Augur of Bolas enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an instant or sorcery card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We draw our power from the infinite ocean of the mind, where all manner of things can be conceived." - Azure creed

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control. Flashback {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player draws three cards. Then that player discards two cards unless they discard a land card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Four parts molten bronze, yes . . . one part frozen mercury, yes, yes . . . but then what?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One breath of the geist turns veins to rivers of ice and freezes hearts midbeat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand. Overload {6}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Izzet specialize in unnatural disaster.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Deadeye Navigator is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "{1}{U}: Exile this creature, then return it to the battlefield under your control."

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, return a creature you control to its owner's hand. Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Because of their capricious nature, faeries can serve as living lenses for disruptive magic.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Flashback {6}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile two target artifacts, creatures, and/or lands you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes it's useful to take a break from existence.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to four cards with different names and reveal them. Target opponent chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target creature on top of its owner's library. Flashback {7}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A spike and a maul are needed to crack their shells, but the taste is worth the effort.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Mist Raven enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When you see a raven, head for the hills. It knows when the ghost-tide is headed in." - Sved, fisherman of Nephalia

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for an instant card or a card with flash, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Flashback {5}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Opportunity isn't something you wait for. It's something you create."

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Phantasmal Image enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it's an Illusion in addition to its other types and it has "When this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. Untap up to four lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The best denials are simply that: a beginning and end unchanged, a dream with no memory."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sea Gate Oracle enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Serum was once derived from Mirrodin's blinkmoths, offering visions of inspiration. Now it is pulled from Phyrexian inkmoths, yielding visions of perfection.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash When Snapcaster Mage enters the battlefield, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. (You may cast that card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's a hole in your plan." - Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each monitor is given an eye for each spire it is to guard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Tandem Lookout is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, draw a card."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Take an extra turn after this one. Exile Temporal Mastery. Miracle {1}{U} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash When Venser, Shaper Savant enters the battlefield, return target spell or permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His marvels of artifice pale in comparison to the developing machinery of his mind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender Whenever Wall of Frost blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I welcome it. The pasture is cleared of weeds and the wolves are frozen solid." - Lumi, goatherd

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Wing Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Phyrexian Golem artifact creature token. Golem creatures you control have flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Progress is our great inheritance, perfection our ultimate destination."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Wingcrafter is paired with another creature, both creatures have flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It rides to a chorus of whispers that are more felt than heard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Destroy target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Witches of the Split-Eye Coven speak of a future when Grixis will overflow with life energy. For now, they must harvest vis from the living to fuel their dark magics.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Corpse Connoisseur enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card, put that card into your graveyard, then shuffle. Unearth {3}{B} ({3}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You will fully understand fear when you discover it is the final thing you put your faith in." - Nicol Bolas

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Death's Shadow gets -X/-X, where X is your life total.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The shadow of the candle looms tall even as its light grows dim.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There came a rush, a sudden fire in the mind. Then the two saw only the sooty fog of madness, heard only the crackling of their last thoughts burning away.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of each combat, any opponent may sacrifice a creature. If a player does, tap Desecration Demon and put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Unearth {B} ({B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The undead of Grixis are fueled by their hatred of the living.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Entomber Exarch enters the battlefield, choose one - • Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. • Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever another creature leaves the battlefield, you may have target player mill two cards. Unearth {2}{B} ({2}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Falkenrath Noble or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I often think on how excited they must feel to be chosen as my prey."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On still nights you can hear its rotted teeth grinding tirelessly on scavenged bones.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, lifelink Pay 7 life: Draw seven cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Avacyn emerged from the broken Helvault, but her freedom came at a price - him." - Thalia, Knight-Cathar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonartifact creature. Its controller mills cards equal to that creature's power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Grixis Slavedriver leaves the battlefield, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Unearth {3}{B} ({3}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it with mana value 3 or less. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After the awakening of the Eldrazi, some vampires took it upon themselves to remind the others where their loyalty should lie.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Each player discards a card. −2: Target player sacrifices a creature. −6: Separate all permanents target player controls into two piles. That player sacrifices all permanents in the pile of their choice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player discards X cards at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dark thoughts hatch and twist within the mind, straining to take wing.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player sacrifices a creature, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Mortician Beetle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the soldier, war is famine; to the scavenger, a feast.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Innistrad is a place where dreams invade the mind and mere shadows exact a terrible toll.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender Ogre Jailbreaker can attack as though it didn't have defender as long as you control a Gate.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It took three years for it to occur to him to use the chain as a weapon, but once it did, he made up for lost time.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Pit Keeper enters the battlefield, if you have four or more creature cards in your graveyard, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The undead are not ‘awakened.' They are evicted when there is no room left in the pit for more bodies."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wisdom from the past is best gathered directly from the source."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Seal of Doom: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A basilisk's gaze is effective, but disposing of physical remains is a tiresome task. It's far more discreet to dissolve one's victim entirely." - Szadek

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature. Flashback {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Flashback {3}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All crave the Blessed Sleep. Few receive it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a creature: Vampire Aristocrat gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I admit, I am a creature of the city. The sights, the nightly excitement, the abundance of fine drink . . ."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As they fought the Eldrazi, many vampires learned to live among humans. Others were unable to make the adjustment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact. Flashback {G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If there's anything a werewolf hates, it's a collar - especially Avacyn's Collar, the symbol of her church.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The shaman rattles not to inspire a battle fury but to drown out the shrieks of those fleeing the Eldrazi.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Heavy light flooded across the landscape, cloaking everything in deep crimson.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bonfire of the Damned deals X damage to target player or planeswalker and each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls. Miracle {X}{R} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Chandra's Outrage deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Chandra never believed in using her "inside voice."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblins journey to the sacrificial peaks in pairs so that the rare survivor might be able to relate the details of the other's grisly demise.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Overload {2}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing evens the odds like a little lightning.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token with haste. Goblin creatures attack each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A goblin raid is a delicate gambit - a blend of stealth, precision, and screaming death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Whenever Goblin Guide attacks, defending player reveals the top card of their library. If it's a land card, that player puts it into their hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've been all over this world. I even remember some of those places."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Hanweir Lancer is paired with another creature, both creatures have first strike.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Whenever a creature you control attacks, Hellrider deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Behind every devil's mayhem lurks a demon's scheme." - Rem Karolus, Blade of the Inquisitors

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and has menace.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The larger the crowd, the harder it is for them to run away.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Magma Jet deals 2 damage to any target. Scry 2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some Akroans make the dangerous pilgrimage to the volcanic temples of Purphoros, where oracles known as flamespeakers glean omens from lava.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mizzium Mortars deals 4 damage to target creature you don't control. Overload {3}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mogg Flunkies can't attack or block alone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They'll attack whatever's in front of them - as long as you tell them where that is.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target land. If that land was nonbasic, Molten Rain deals 2 damage to the land's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It came as a cruel answer to the farmers' prayers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Mudbutton Torchrunner dies, it deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The oil sloshes against his skull as he nears his destination: the Frogtosser Games and the lighting of the Flaming Boggart.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodrush - {1}{R}, Discard Pyrewild Shaman: Target attacking creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn. Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, if Pyrewild Shaman is in your graveyard, you may pay {3}. If you do, return Pyrewild Shaman to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Who'd want to ignite things one at a time?" - Chandra Nalaar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that has the same name as a card in your graveyard, you may put a quest counter on Pyromancer Ascension. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell while Pyromancer Ascension has two or more quest counters on it, you may copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodrush - {R}, Discard Rubblebelt Maaka: Target attacking creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The maaka remain loyal to us in this time of strife. We don't even have to feed them - our enemies do." - Nedja, Gruul shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, Sacrifice a creature: Scorched Rusalka deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each small blaze she sets jogs her memory, letting her piece together the mystery of her own fiery end.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Scourge Devil enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. Unearth {2}{R} ({2}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Skirsdag Cultist deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Within blood is life. Within life is fire. Within fire is the path to our masters' glory!"

property.value: Thunderous Wrath deals 5 damage to any target. Miracle {R} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. Until end of turn, it gets +2/+0 and gains haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The horror lurched about like a puppet from a madman's nightmare, squeezing the life from its own kind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Vithian Stinger deals 1 damage to any target. Unearth {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste When Zealous Conscripts enters the battlefield, gain control of target permanent until end of turn. Untap that permanent. It gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach Tap an untapped Spider you control: Search your graveyard and/or library for a card named Arachnus Web and put it onto the battlefield attached to target creature. If you search your library this way, shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. At the beginning of the end step, if enchanted creature's power is 4 or greater, destroy Arachnus Web.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Avacyn's protection is everywhere. From the holy church to the sacred glade, all that we see is under her blessed watch."

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an opponent had an artifact enter the battlefield under their control this turn, you may pay {1}{G} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Create a 4/4 green Beast creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 3/3 green Elephant creature token. Flashback {3}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste When Craterhoof Behemoth enters the battlefield, creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{G}: Death-Hood Cobra gains reach until end of turn. {1}{G}: Death-Hood Cobra gains deathtouch until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Size alone does not guarantee survival." - Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn. Populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So many oppose us, but we are the reed that bends without breaking."

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may play an additional land this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An explorer's reward is a view of tomorrow's possibilities.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Fists of Ironwood enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens. Enchanted creature has trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To those who can hear it, Gaea's battle song brings power as swift as sunlight and as enduring as the deep roots of the forest." - Gamelen, Citanul elder

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life's greatest lessons don't come from focus or concentration. They come from breathing and simply noticing." - Seton, centaur druid

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Hungry Spriggan attacks, it gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If a spriggan's eyes are larger than its stomach, it has ways to remedy the situation.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If you cast this spell during your main phase, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Krosa the great. Krosa the enduring. Look to the forest, and it will share its bounty." - Zyd, Kamahlite druid

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach When Penumbra Spider dies, create a 2/4 black Spider creature token with reach.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When it snared a passing cockatrice, its own soul darkly doubled.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose two - • Target player gains 7 life. • Put target noncreature permanent on top of its owner's library. • Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library. • Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target green card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even what is lost beyond recall returns when coaxed by a dryad's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}: Exile target card from a graveyard. If it was a creature card, put a +1/+1 counter on Scavenging Ooze and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In nature, not a single bone or scrap of flesh goes to waste.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Seal of Primordium: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am the simplifier, the root that drags all artifice to earth." - Seal inscription

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodrush - {G}, Discard Slaughterhorn: Target attacking creature gets +3/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Orzhov clergy would never cross its path, but sending thrull couriers to do so is cheap and entertaining.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create an X/X green Ooze creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Give me enough refuse and mana and I will summon an ooze that can engulf all of Ravnica." - Cevraya, Golgari shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, target creature gains trample and gets +X/+X, where X is the number of attacking creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The hermit dies. The outcast dies. The lone wolf dies. Only those who stick together survive this world." - Uros, Pendelhaven elder

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a creature spell you cast this turn was countered by a spell or ability an opponent controlled, you may pay {0} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Look at the top seven cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sylvan Ranger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Not all paths are found on the forest floor."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tarmogoyf's power is equal to the number of card types among cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What doesn't grow, dies. And what dies grows the tarmogoyf.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {R} and/or {W} (You may pay an additional {R} and/or {W} as you cast this spell.) When Thornscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {R} kicker, it deals 2 damage to any target. When Thornscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {W} kicker, destroy target artifact.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Thragtusk enters the battlefield, you gain 5 life. When Thragtusk leaves the battlefield, create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Always carry two spears." - Mokgar, Kalonian hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{G}, {T}: Target creature you control fights another target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Peace will come to Innistrad, but only after all abominations have been dealt with, one by one."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Vital Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Phyrexian Golem artifact creature token. {1}: Regenerate target Golem you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For every one that falls, ten shall rise. The revelation of New Phyrexia is at hand." - Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Destroy target nonland permanent with mana value 3 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Izzet quickly suspended their policy of lifetime guarantees.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 5/5 green Wurm creature token with trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The consciousness of Mat'Selesnya does not always spread in peaceful ways.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. It gains "At the beginning of your end step, return this creature to its owner's hand." Then put the rest of the cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn. Target creature gets -0/-3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Life's circle has become inverted in Grixis. The same energy is endlessly recycled and becomes more stagnant with each pass.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +4/-4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Finally, a weapon the Boros can't confiscate!" - Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Bronzebeak Moa gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They fight for their home with more loyalty than any conscript.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Broodmate Dragon enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Frozen in fear, the goblins stared upward at the circling hunter - and were promptly eaten by its diving mate.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 3/3 green Centaur creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Centaurs are sent to evangelize in Gruul territories where words of war speak louder than prayers of peace.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature blocks, that creature's controller loses 1 life. {1}{B}{R}: Regenerate Carnage Gladiator.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not the foulest or bloodiest act at Rix Maadi by a stretch.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Centaur Healer enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Instructors at the Kasarna training grounds are capable healers in case their students fail to grasp the subtleties of combat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Coiling Oracle enters the battlefield, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Snaking remnants of nature directed by a body of thought and progress, the oracles embody all that is Simic.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent sacrifices a creature, discards three cards, then loses 5 life. You return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand, draw three cards, then gain 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is always a greater power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Deputy of Acquittals enters the battlefield, you may return another target creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Dinrova Horror enters the battlefield, return target permanent to its owner's hand, then that player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Welcome to the Dimir Public Offices. Not responsible for death or loss of property. Basement off-limits." - Sign outside Dinrova Building

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. −2: Target creature you control fights another target creature. −7: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control have double strike, trample, hexproof, and haste."

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Evil Twin enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it has "{U}{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature with the same name as this creature."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You can always tell the evil one by the dagger he's sticking in you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, haste Sacrifice a creature: Falkenrath Aristocrat gains indestructible until end of turn. If the sacrificed creature was a Human, put a +1/+1 counter on Falkenrath Aristocrat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your blood is quite pleasing. A pity there's not enough for both of us."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fiery Justice deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets. Target opponent gains 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the rebels couldn't breach the castle to kill Lalor the Obstinate, they tried a more internal approach to depose the pretender king.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Bloodrush - {R}{G}, Discard Ghor-Clan Rampager: Target attacking creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Simic come from the cold slow depths. How could they understand the fire in a wild heart?" - Kroshkar, Gruul shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When asked how much power is required, Izzet mages always answer "more."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Golgari don't bury their dead. They plant them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target player loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like corpse-worms through a carapace, rotwurms slide through the hollowed bones of the undercity.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ground Assault deals damage to target creature equal to the number of lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Taking down a dragon is easy. All you need is enough space to get in a good swing." - Narbulg Nine Fingers

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0 and have menace.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are the heart of the wild, the fire in its eyes, and the howl in its throat. Come, join the battle to which you were born." - Kroshkar, Gruul shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}. • Izzet Charm deals 2 damage to target creature. • Draw two cards, then discard two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Kathari Bomber deals combat damage to a player, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens and sacrifice Kathari Bomber. Unearth {3}{B}{R} ({3}{B}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Touched by moroii" - Undercity slang meaning "to grow old"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. Create an X/X green Ooze creature token, where X is that spell's mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Simic can grow anything out of a puddle of sludge. I just hope they never join forces with the Golgari." - Teysa Karlov, Grand Envoy of Orzhov

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Niv-Mizzet, Dracogenius deals damage to a player, you may draw a card. {U}{R}: Niv-Mizzet, Dracogenius deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He has no patience for minds that do not inspire him or explode by trying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Obzedat, Ghost Council enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. At the beginning of your end step, you may exile Obzedat. If you do, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of your next upkeep. It gains haste.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {1}{R}: Olivia Voldaren deals 1 damage to another target creature. That creature becomes a Vampire in addition to its other types. Put a +1/+1 counter on Olivia Voldaren. {3}{B}{B}: Gain control of target Vampire for as long as you control Olivia Voldaren.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player mills two cards. Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mirko Vosk hunted anyone with knowledge of the maze, draining the chances of the other guilds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are all decaying, always in a state of near-death. One moment without breath and we begin to break down." - Cevraya, Golgari shaman

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rhox monks are dedicated to spiritual growth and learning, and most bear the sigils of many students. However, they do not gladly suffer fools or those who disagree with their carefully wrought dogma.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Sedraxis Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card. Unearth {1}{B} ({1}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We've bred out the shortcomings of the species' natural form and replaced them with assets of our own design." - Momir Vig

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sin Collector enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose an instant or sorcery card from it and exile that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That must weigh heavily on your soul. Let me purge it for you."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I do not know which gives me more pride: the legions of soldiers marching in thunderous lockstep, or the cry of the skyknights riding their rocs like jagged lightning overhead." - Razia

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one or both - • Counter target creature spell. • Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Birth and death are both reversible." - Nicol Bolas

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. Discard two cards: Soul Ransom's controller sacrifices it, then draws two cards. Only your opponents may activate this ability.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain X life and draw X cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let the knowledge of absolute law inspire you to live a life of absolute order."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the Rakdos, "suicidal charge" and "good showmanship" are one and the same.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sprouting Thrinax dies, create three 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vast network of predation on Jund has actually caused some strange creatures to adapt to being eaten.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance Players can't untap more than one creature during their untap steps.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the most battle-hardened soldiers pause in her presence for a moment of introspection.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. {2}{R}{W}: Create a 1/1 red and white Soldier creature token with haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The volcanic winds make a maze of the skies of Jund. If we mean to invade, we must first learn their invisible paths."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn. Overload {3}{U}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hear that? Those notes mean we've arrived at Sunhome! Let our allies' hearts soar and our enemies' hearts shatter at the sound!" - Klattic, Boros legionnaire

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Esper, like any work of art, can be truly appreciated only from a distance." - Tezzeret

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample and lifelink. (Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Trostani's influence grew, vitality spread through the Conclave - much to the other guilds' dismay.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw three cards. You may play an additional land this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the Simic released more of their krasis experiments, they required new habitats, always at the expense of the locals.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. You draw cards equal to that creature's power. At the beginning of your next upkeep, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. If you do, discard cards equal to that creature's toughness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent casts a spell during your turn and when Voice of Resurgence dies, create a green and white Elemental creature token with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender, flying Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It provides what every discerning mage requires - time to think.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Wayfaring Temple's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control. Whenever Wayfaring Temple deals combat damage to a player, populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One of the most ferocious and deadly gargantuans, the thoctar never sees its worshippers, but it often awakens surrounded by gifts and sacrifices.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Zur the Enchanter attacks, you may search your library for an enchantment card with mana value 3 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Zur remained aloof from Terisiare's suffering, intent only on his own perfection.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target attacking or blocking creature on top of its owner's library. Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Boros Reckoner is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to any target. {RW}: Boros Reckoner gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Imagine a thunderstorm that's also a tactical genius. That's him." - Dars Gostok, Firefist captain

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Burning-Tree Emissary enters the battlefield, add {R}{G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who regard the Gruul as savage simpletons underestimate the subtle power of their shamans.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 4/4 red and green Giant Warrior creature token with haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step. Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying and lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Remember by whose gift you ascend." - Milana, Orzhov prelate

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{W}{U}: Exile target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Olka collected the evening mist for years, studying its secrets. Once she learned its essence, she could vanish with a thought.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or enchantment, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One day every pillar will be a tree and every hall a glade." - Trostani

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}{G}: Each blocked creature gets +1/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Tattermunge gang has no words for the spell that whips their instinctual rage into a frenzy. They only know they like it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield if {B} was spent to cast this spell. Creatures target player controls get +2/+0 and gain haste until end of turn if {R} was spent to cast this spell. (Do both if {B}{R} was spent.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Wort, the Raidmother enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 red and green Goblin Warrior creature tokens. Each red or green instant or sorcery spell you cast has conspire. (As you cast the spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose new targets for the copy.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The maze-like design embodies the core of Azorius law - strict structure designed to test wills and stall change.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has deathtouch and lifelink. Equip {2}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: During their endless travels, the mages of the Goma Fada caravan have learned ways to harness both life and death.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Have you ever held a Boros signet? There's a weight to it that belies its size - a weight of strength and of pride." - Agrus Kos

property.name: Rules
property.value: Activated abilities of artifacts and creatures can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The priests tried cursing it. The mages tried dispelling it. In the end, they all obeyed it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An emblem of a secret guild, the Dimir insignia is seen only by its own members - and the doomed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Depending on your point of view, the seal represents a proud guardian of the natural cycle or one who has sold her soul to darkness for eternal life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creature cards in graveyards and libraries can't enter the battlefield. Players can't cast spells from graveyards or libraries.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you wind up in one of mine, you can be sure as silver it will be your last." - Grafdigger Wulmer

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gruul territorial markings need not be legible. The blood, snot, and muck used to smear them are unmistakably Gruul.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Izzet signet is redesigned often, each time becoming closer to a vanity portrait of Niv-Mizzet.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The form of the sigil is just as important as the sigil itself. If it's carried on a medallion, its bearer is a master. If it's tattooed on the body, its bearer is a slave.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Made of bone and boiled in blood, a Rakdos signet is not considered finished until it has been used as a murder weapon.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The symbol of the Conclave is one of unity, with tree supporting sun and sun feeding tree.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the Simic Combine, its sigil serves not as an emblem of honor but as a trademark. Its familiar image on any biological commodity attests to superb craftsmanship, ingenious innovation, and higher cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Arcane Sanctum enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W}, {U}, or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We must rely on our own knowledge, not on the dogma of the seekers or the mutterings of the sphinxes." - Tullus of Palandius

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Arid Mesa: Search your library for a Mountain or Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Azorius Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Azorius symbol stares down like a great eye, reminding visitors of the watchful presence of Isperia and her lawmages.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Boros Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It promises protection to those in need and proclaims a warning to any who would threaten Ravnican law.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Cavern of Souls enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type, and that spell can't be countered.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Crumbling Necropolis enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They say the ruins of Sedraxis were once a shining capital in Vithia. Now it is a blight, a place to be avoided by the living." - Olcot, Rider of Joffik

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dimir Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the cold corridors of the undercity, misinformation unfurls from Duskmantle like a spreading stain.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Golgari Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every part of the gate was reclaimed from forgotten ruins and imbued with new purpose by the Swarm.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gruul Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The scarred rubble around the gate is testament to past meetings of the Clans, summits that inevitably devolved into brawls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Izzet Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beyond lies the culmination of all Izzet projects, a grand experiment led by the dragon Niv-Mizzet himself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Jungle Shrine enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Naya, ambition and treachery are scarce, hunted nearly to extinction by the awe owed to terrestrial gods.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Marsh Flats: Search your library for a Plains or Swamp card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Misty Rainforest: Search your library for a Forest or Island card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Orzhov Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We do not believe in hiding our wealth in the shadows. This is Orzhov, and this is how we reward greatness." - Teysa Karlov, Grand Envoy of Orzhov

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rakdos Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Maze-runners who pass through the Rakdos gate leave behind their scruples and a significant amount of skin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Savage Lands enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B}, {R}, or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jund is a world as cruel as those who call it home. Their brutal struggles scar the land even as it carves them in its image, a vicious circle spiraling out of control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Scalding Tarn: Search your library for an Island or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Seaside Citadel enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For wisdom's sake, it was built high to gaze on all things. For glory's sake, it was built high as a testament of power. For strength's sake, it was built high to repel all attacks.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Selesnya Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Selesyna welcome all to help them heal the city's wounds. The price, however, is devotion to the guild and a selfless belief in Trostani.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Untold riches await those who forsake the bustling world to search the secret, silent places.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Simic Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Simic biomancers don't concern themselves with guarding a gate. Their ever-present creations are enough to ward off trespassers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Verdant Catacombs: Search your library for a Swamp or Forest card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
